strings.Value: "A hot day. I don't remember the last time I had to cast so many spells!"
"On days like this, I'm grateful to the Technic League overseers, who taught me how to fight head-to-head. At least I can fight my way out of a tangle, on the days that I run out of magic!"
"I too must prepare my spells for tomorrow. Will you sit with me?"
"Luckily, the true traveler's arsenal includes many inexhaustible resources â€” will power, acumen, courage... and a sense of humor, for that matter!"
"From my experience, being without magic is trouble by half. But being stuck without a rope or a pole in the middle of a river... That's trouble in full!"
"I don't complain about having to pray every day. I'm always happy to talk to my god. But he answers me so rarely..."
